divs: Sighting Details On date and time listed, while standing outside atwork (about five miles south of Beaumont TX) I saw in the northern sky what Ithought was an airplane flying towards me with its landing light on. Afterstudying it I noticed that it was hovering, motionless. Approximately 10 secondslater the craft slowly decended (about two thumbnails) then sped away upward andin a slight curve to the left (about three thumbnails) until it was a tiny pointof light, and then gone.
Summary: Light (like aircraft landing light) zipped off int
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Beaumont
There were no other sightings in Beaumont on or around March 26th 2002
